mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ac_acount_log (
id,
user_id,
trade_id,
trade_seq,
balance_type,
trade_type,
trade_stat,
trade_time,
trade_money,
total_money,
trade_desc,
oper_id,
oper_time,
ext1,
ext2,
ext3,
note,
) VALUES (
#{id},
#{userId},
#{tradeId},
#{tradeSeq},
#{balanceType},
#{tradeType},
#{tradeStat},
#{tradeTime},
#{tradeMoney},
#{totalMoney},
#{tradeDesc},
#{operId},
#{operTime},
#{ext1},
#{ext2},
#{ext3},
#{note},
)
mapper.update:
UPDATE ac_acount_log
user_id = #{userId},
trade_id = #{tradeId},
trade_seq = #{tradeSeq},
balance_type = #{balanceType},
trade_type = #{tradeType},
trade_stat = #{tradeStat},
trade_time = #{tradeTime},
trade_money = #{tradeMoney},
total_money = #{totalMoney},
trade_desc = #{tradeDesc},
oper_id = #{operId},
oper_time = #{operTime},
ext1 = #{ext1},
ext2 = #{ext2},
ext3 = #{ext3},
note = #{note},
and id = #{id}
